casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff,
v.
Bruce BOONE, Defendant-Movant. M-1455/1456/1457 September Term 2016
079241 Supreme Court of New Jersey. July 20, 2017

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to proceed as an indigent (M-1455) is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motions for leave to file a notice of petition for certification and petition for certification as within time (M-1456) and for the assignment of counsel (M-1457) are denied; and it is further

ORDERED that the notice of petition for certification is dismissed.
